item.title: RIOT
item.description: score:134 Chances: Riot reported a new all-time record hash rate capacity of 10.7 EH/s, strong revenue of $76.7 million, and an expanded execution of power strategy, which suggests positive growth potential. Bitcoin production and operations updates for July 2023 show Riot’s continued commitment to expanding its Bitcoin mining capabilities and efficiency.
